name: Pizza Crust II
author: Susan
summary: Tasty pizza crust!  Dough may be frozen after being rolled out to use at a later date.  Cover it with the toppings of your choice.
ingredients: 4 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
½ cup grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese
directions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in 1 1/2 cups warm water
Let stand 5 to 6 minutes, until mixture is foamy
In a large bowl, mix together half the flour, remaining water, garlic powder, salt, oregano, and margarine
Add yeast mixture, and stir to combine
Work in remaining flour 1/2 cup at a time until a soft dough forms
Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface, and knead for 10 minutes
Put dough in large plastic bag, and place in refrigerator
Let rise until tripled in bulk
For a round pizza, break off about 2 cups of the dough
Grease a 15 inch round pan, and sprinkle lightly with corn meal
Roll out the dough to fit the pan, stretching it to fit
Brush crust with olive oil, and sprinkle with cheese
Bake at 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes
